scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/mobile/flutter && flutter pub get
scripts.build:all: npm run build:js && npm run build:flutter
scripts.test:all: npm run test:js && npm run test:flutter
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && cd packages/mobile/flutter && flutter clean
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspaces && cd packages/mobile/flutter && flutter analyze
